overview: When fatherly love becomes forbidden lust. Long time friends Douglas and Scott have watched each other's sons Daniel and Noah grow up into strapping young men. But when the fathers and sons get together to celebrate Daniels 18th birthday, Douglas is faced with a sudden attraction to young, athletic Noah. Meanwhile, daddy Scott is seduced by vulnerable, sex-starved Daniel.
tagline: When fatherly love becomes forbidden lust
title: Fathers & Sons
